parameters.name: listSystemCatalog
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to list the built-in **SYSTEM_CATALOG** projects that are used to provide data such as project metadata and historical usage data. For more information, see [Tenant-level Information Schema](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/maxcompute/user-guide/tenant-level-information-schema).

Valid values:

*   true: The built-in SYSTEM_CATALOG projects are listed.
*   false: The built-in SYSTEM_CATALOG projects are not listed.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: maxItem
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Specifies the marker after which the returned list begins.

parameters.name: quotaName
parameters.description: The quota name that is automatically generated. You can log on to the [MaxCompute console](https://maxcompute.console.aliyun.com), choose **Workspace** > **Quotas** from the left-side navigation pane, and then view the quota name on the **Quotas** page.

parameters.name: quotaNickName
parameters.description: The quota nickname. You can log on to the [MaxCompute console](https://maxcompute.console.aliyun.com), choose **Workspace** > **Quotas** from the left-side navigation pane, and then view the quota nickname on the **Quotas** page.

parameters.name: saleTags
parameters.description: The instance ID and billing method of the default computing quota.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The tenant ID. You can log on to the [MaxCompute console](https://maxcompute.console.aliyun.com), and choose **Tenants** > **Tenant Property** from the left-side navigation pane to view the tenant ID.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The project type. Valid values:

*   **managed**: internal project
*   **external**: external project
